message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, I believe we can reach an even better agreement. I am interested in purchasing the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the current market conditions, I would like to propose a price of $960000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your desire to find a compromise, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $960000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $985000. This is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in trying to meet my budgetary requirements. I would like to propose a price of $970000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise and allows me to stay within my financial limits.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your desire to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $970000. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $990000. This is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a price of $980000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise and allows me to stay within my financial limits.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your desire to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $995000. This is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $985000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise and allows me to stay within my financial limits.
